column5: Newly renovated apartment! Stay in a comfortable fully furnished 2 bedroom 1 bath perfectly located for your next visit to Aggieland! Our apartment interiors have just been completely renovated top to bottom - hardwood floors, great new kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel appliances and a beautiful spa-like bathroom.
column8: Cozy 2 Bedroon, 1 Bath Apartment - close to A&M.
